00014 #ifndef STLUTILITY_REF_CAST_H
00015 #define STLUTILITY_REF_CAST_H
00016 
00017 namespace STLUtility {
00025 template < typename First, typename Second >
00026 First& ref_cast( Second& value ) {
00027    // This is for concept checking for assignment.
00028    // There will be nothing generated for this.
00029    if ( false ) {
00030       // In order to be used in ref_cast the objects must
00031       // be copyable from each other.
00032       // ( for instance enum<->integer )
00033       First dummy;
00034       dummy = static_cast< Second >( value );
00035    }
00036 
00037    return const_cast< First& >((First&) value );
00038 }
00039 
00040 } // STLUtility
00041 
00042 #endif // STLUTILITY_REF_CAST_H
